scripts.beforePublish: npm run  eslint&& npm run build
scripts.release:first: npm run release:before && npm run release -- --first-release
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run release:before && npm run release -- --prerelease alpha
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:before && npm run release -- --prerelease-as patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:before && npm run release -- --prerelease-as minor
scripts.release:major: npm run release:before && npm run release -- --prerelease-as major
